revised_title: Tide-Observations at Liverpool: A Discussion by J.W. Lubbock
tldr: J.W. Lubbock presents a discussion of tide observations made at Liverpool, analyzing 14,000 data points. The data is classified by moon's transit, parallax, and declination, along with corresponding dates, times, and heights of high water. The study also compares tide differences between London and St. Katherine's Docks.
